name: UBoundsCopyComponent
doc: Component used to copy the bounds of another Actor.

BoundsSourceActor: Actor to copy the bounds from to set up the transform.
bUseCollidingComponentsForSourceBounds: If true, the source actor's bounds will include its colliding components bounds.
bKeepOwnBoundsScale: If true, the actor's scale will be changed so that after adjustment, its own bounds match the source bounds.
bUseCollidingComponentsForOwnBounds: If true, the actor's own bounds will include its colliding components bounds.

methods.name: SetRotation
methods.doc: Copy the rotation from BoundsSourceActor to this component

methods.name: SetTransformToBounds
methods.doc: Set this component transform to include the BoundsSourceActor bounds
